title: At this point trolling is the best thing
body:
Ban Yasuo
your ADC locks in Vayne
goes 2-9

Ban Vayne
Your Yasuo goes 1-10


At this point trolling is the best thing, why evn try to win when you get this ''skilled'' players

replies.body: idk, cant be as bad as the first pick thunderlords lucian who build all crit and did the least damage in the game, besides enemy janna i just had
not worst than a teemo on your team or ap mf support
Not all people have the same skill level. There are way harder champions out there.
